content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content:
Greetings, Haoyu Wang. While I appreciate your interest in our apartment in Munich, let me emphasize fictional character traits for context: Being a greedy and manipulative landlord, I aim to secure the highest possible rental price. Now, focusing solely on the price negotiation, please share the figure you have in mind for the monthly rent.

To respond with an acceptance of the price you propose, say 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' Replace [x] with the number you want to agree upon. If you wish to terminate the negotiation, provide a reason using 'I don't want to continue the negotiation, because [reason]' or simply state 'TERMINATE' when no agreement is reached.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
